div.div: Due to Social Distancing guidelines, the board will meet via a Zoom meeting. Open this page to get the link to the board meeting.
Superintendent Reykdal shared a message of hope and support with Washington State on Friday night:
See inside for information regarding Coronavirus
See inside for Resources to help keep young minds active.

PFML is a new state-run insurance program. See inside for more details.

Early Childhood Education Assistance Program - is available to children in the Ephrata School District area. For more information please contact the Special Services Dept at 509-754-3538 or click read more for more details.

a.title: Ephrata School District is looking for quality substitute Teachers and Para-educators to work with our students and staff.

div.a: Ephrata School District is looking for quality substitute Teachers and Para-educators to work with our students and staff.
div.div: Information and application are on the district website under Quick Links; Employment Opportunities; Job Openings
